sentences.en: "Sorry Edward," I said, splattering the cloth with jam.
sentences.cn: “对不起，爱德华，”我说道，因为我把果酱洒在了桌布上。

sentences.en: 400 trucks may sit in a jam for ten hours waiting to cross the limited number of bridges.
sentences.cn: 400 辆卡车可能会堵上10个小时才能通过有限的几座桥。

sentences.en: A 25 mile traffic jam clogged the northbound carriageway of the M6.
sentences.cn: 长达25英里的交通拥堵阻塞了M6号高速公路的北行车道。

sentences.en: A chair had been jammed up against the door.
sentences.cn: 门被一把椅子牢牢顶住了。

sentences.en: a jam sandwich
sentences.cn: 果酱三明治

sentences.en: a promise of jam tomorrow wasn't enough to satisfy them.
sentences.cn: 口惠而实不至的诺言难以令他们满意。

sentences.en: A rope jammed the boat's propeller.
sentences.cn: 一条绳子卡住了船的推进器。

sentences.en: Crabtree & Evelyn has just launched a new jam, Worcesterberry Preserve.
sentences.cn: 瑰珀翠刚推出一款新果酱——伍斯特浆果果酱。

sentences.en: Did she do things like bottling fruit or making jam?
sentences.cn: 她干过将水果装瓶或做果酱之类的活计吗？

sentences.en: He jammed his foot on the accelerator and the car sped off.
sentences.cn: 他使劲踩下油门，汽车飞驰而去。

sentences.en: His room was jam-packed with fruit, flowers, gifts etc.
sentences.cn: 他的房间里堆满了水果、鲜花及礼品等。

sentences.en: Hundreds of departing motorists jammed the roads.
sentences.cn: 数百名打算驾车离开的司机堵住了道路。

sentences.en: Hundreds of jam pots lined her scrubbed shelves.
sentences.cn: 她那擦得干干净净的架子上排列着几百个果酱罐。

sentences.en: jam jars
sentences.cn: 果酱罐

sentences.en: My gran's given us some apple jam.
sentences.cn: 我奶奶送给我们一些苹果酱。

sentences.en: Pickled cucumbers, jam, pickled berries, tomatoes; you name it, they've got it.
sentences.cn: 酸黄瓜、果酱、腌浆果、西红柿，凡是你说得出的，他们都有。

sentences.en: Place them in a jam jar, porcelain bowl, or other similar container.
sentences.cn: 将它们装入果酱罐、瓷碗或其他类似容器中。

sentences.en: scones and jam with clotted cream
sentences.cn: 夹有凝脂奶油和果酱的烤饼

sentences.en: She sat in the car, silently fuming at the traffic jam.
sentences.cn: 她坐在汽车里，心中对交通堵塞感到十分恼火。

sentences.en: Sorry we’re late. We got stuck in a traffic jam.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我们来晚了，路上堵车。

sentences.en: strawberry jam
sentences.cn: 草莓酱

sentences.en: The front roller has jammed on the photocopier.
sentences.cn: 复印机的前滚筒卡住了。

sentences.en: The second time he fired his gun jammed.
sentences.cn: 他开第二枪时，枪卡壳了。

sentences.en: The train was jam-packed with commuters.
sentences.cn: 火车上挤满了上下班的旅客。

sentences.en: They were in a real jam, Bob thought glumly.
sentences.cn: 他们确实遇上麻烦了，鲍勃闷闷不乐地想。

sentences.en: We're not just a lot of old biddies going on about jam.
sentences.cn: 我们不只是一大群唠唠叨叨地谈论果酱的老太婆。

sentences.en: Wipe the jam off my mouth, will you?
sentences.cn: 你帮忙把我嘴上的果酱擦掉，好吗？

words.tran_cn: 堵塞的；拥挤的；轧住了的

phrases.tran_cn: 事情搞得一团糟，陷入困境
(英)允诺而做不到的好事；可望而不可即的事物

trans.tran_cn: 果酱，拥挤，挤满，困境，[无线]干扰
trans.tran_en: a thick sweet substance made from boiled fruit and sugar, eaten especially on bread

trans.tran_cn: 使堵塞；挤进，使塞满；混杂；压碎
trans.tran_en: if a lot of people or vehicles jam a place, they fill it so that it is difficult to move

trans.tran_cn: 挤满，拥挤，堵塞，发生故障
trans.tran_en: if a moving part of something jams, or if you jam it, it no longer works properly because something is preventing it from moving

trans.tran_cn: 把…挤进，把…塞满，使挤紧，使堵塞，使卡住
trans.tran_en: to push something somewhere using a lot of force, until it can move no further
